channel.title: ClickOption is lagging in SRL 3.2
channel.description: i had SRL version 2.4 Clickoption didn't lag in it. But now when i downloaded SRL version 3.2 when i use command Clickoption, it lags pretty much. Why is that?

item.title: ClickOption is lagging in SRL 3.2
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

Most likely because it uses FindBitmapMaskTolerance which lags the comp, The most likely reason why it didnt in 2.4 is because it probly used findbitmapin, but that would only be able to click white text, which is probly why they changed it

Read full topic
